title: Integrated Reading-Listening Intensive Short-Term Program for Science-Related English Vocabulary Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary (approximately 2,000-word level) and understanding of fundamental scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices, with a focus on acquiring science-related English vocabulary for job-specific contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize 300 specialized vocabulary words in science at both phonetic and semantic levels with over 80% accuracy.
Through listening-reading parallel activities, learners can utilize core vocabulary from scientific English texts in context with over 70% accuracy.
In post-assessments after 10 weeks, the reading-listening parallel learning group achieves a 15% higher average vocabulary retention rate compared to the traditional reading group.

resources: English reading materials in science fields

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
